summary: Adds a crafting form to convert the heavy helm to look slightly more plain and generic
descriptionHtml:
To be able to craft this you need to have a vanilla Dawnguard Full Helmet in your inventory and then use the forge. [color=#ff7700][b]Misc crafting section[/b][/color].
This plain helmet has the exact same Dawnguard buffs and stats, it basically just provides an option for a different look.

[color=#00ff00][b]Update:[/b][/color]
Added a recolored version without Dawnguard stats/buffs to go with Steel Plate armor (matching set). Same crafting recipe as the vanilla Steel Plate Helmet and slightly stronger stats. [b][color=#ff7700]Steel crafting section[/color][/b].


Credit & thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim and its assets.


---------------
Installation
---------------
Dawnguard is obviously required.
Place the 'Meshes' and 'Textures' folders inside the game's DATA folder.
Also, if using a file with an .ESP file, place it inside the DATA folder and then enable the mod in the launcher or use a mod manager.
author: defunkt

files.name: DG plain heavy helm - Steel Plate version - Craftable
